resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204648</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Jim Crow and segregation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Jim Krähe und Abtrennung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Corneille et ségrégation de Jim</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Corvo e segregation de Jim</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Corvo e segregazione di Jim</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Jim Crow και διαχωρισμός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cuervo y segregación de Jim</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is an integrated lesson plan that incorporates both eighth grade language arts and history. Using Internet research, literary analysis, and persuasive technique, students will practice reading and writing skills while analyzing the impact of Jim Crow</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein integrierter Lektionplan, der beide 
achten Gradsprachenkünste und Geschichte enthält. Mit 
Internet-Forschung, literarischer Analyse und überzeugender Technik 
üben Kursteilnehmer, Fähigkeiten beim Analysieren der Auswirkung der
Jim Krähe zu lesen und zu schreiben</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un plan intégré de leçon qui incorpore les
deux huitième arts et histoire de langage de catégorie. En 
utilisant la recherche d'Internet, l'analyse littéraire, et la 
technique persuasive, les étudiants pratiqueront lire et écrire des 
qualifications tout en analysant l'impact de la corneille de Jim</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma planta integrada da lição que 
incorpore ambas as oitavos artes e history da língua da classe. 
Usando a pesquisa do Internet, a análise literária, e a 
técnica persuasive, os estudantes praticarão ler e escrever 
habilidades ao analisar o impacto do corvo de Jim</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un programma integrato di lezione che 
comprende entrambe le ottave arti e storia di linguaggio del grado. 
Usando la ricerca del Internet, l'analisi letteraria e la 
tecnica convincente, gli allievi si eserciteranno in leggere e 
scrivere le abilità mentre analizzano l'effetto del corvo di Jim</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα ενσωματωμένο σχέδιο μαθήματος που 
ενσωματώνει και τις όγδοες τη γλωσσικές τέχνες και ιστορία 
βαθμού. Χρησιμοποιώντας την έρευνα Διαδικτύου, τη 
λογοτεχνική ανάλυση, και την πειστική τεχνική, οι σπουδαστές θα 
ασκήσουν και τις δεξιότητες αναλύοντας τον αντίκτυπο jim 
Crow</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es un plan integrado de la lección que 
incorpora ambos octavos artes e historia del lenguaje del grado. 
Usando la investigación del Internet, el análisis literario, y
la técnica persuasiva, los estudiantes practicarán el leer y el 
escribir de habilidades mientras que analizan el impacto del cuervo de
Jim</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

    </metadata>
  </description>
